first-screen.desc: In the secluded depths of the metaverse, lays an army of Diamond Handed soldiers called The Diamond Boyz Army. The Diamond Boyz Army is a soldier series created and curated by legendary jeweler Johnny Dang to represent the Diamond Boyz, a private club that was until now, exclusively for celebrities and high rollers.

third-screen.desc: 10,000 high resolution, 3D modeled avatars, ready to wreak havoc. Over 300 unique traits including Diamond Chains, Grillz, Earrings, Weapons, Body Armor, Environments and more!

0.title: How many members are there in the Diamond Boyz Army?
0.text: There will only ever be 10,000 Diamond Boyz in the genesis collection.

1.title: How much does each Diamond Boy cost?
1.text: Each member of the Diamond Boyz Army will be minted at 0.07 ETH on minting day.

2.title: How many Diamond Boyz can be minted?
2.text: To ensure fairness and give everyone an opportunity to participate, you can only mint 20 Diamond Boyz per wallet.

text.1: No! Everyone will have the same opportunity to participate in this event.

4.title: What is the Smart Contract Address for The Diamond Boyz Army?
4.text: This will be launched on Twitter and Discord on the date of the release.

5.title: Where can I buy/sell The Diamond Boyz Army?

text.1: Diamond Boyz Army will only be available on this webiste for minting and will initially be available on
text.2: for buying, selling and trading! Users will later be able to import them to Diamond Swap for all the above features.

6.title: What benefits will I receive for holding a Diamond Boyz Army NFT?

text.1: By joining the army during minting, you can receive special rewards such as jewelry, VIP access to Johnny Dang, passes to the World's 1st Live NFT experience and more!
text.2: Every avatar minted will also receive a FREE airdrop of a non-released NFT for the World's 1st Live NFT Experience.
text.3: After the minting, you will receive a lifetime of rewards. Everything from access to special events, VIP concerts, access to celebrities, voting rights and free airdrops of future NFT's in the series.

7.title: What are your social media accounts?
